Parameters.Parameter: A neutral background map for MAPC online maps.

Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT * FROM roads WHERE facilityty in (3,11) ) AS roads
(SELECT * from trails where path_type IN ('E', 'U', 'T')) AS trails
( SELECT * FROM roads WHERE facilityty in (0,1,5,6,7,8,9,10) ) AS roads
( SELECT * FROM roads WHERE facilityty in (2,4)) AS roads
( SELECT * FROM boundary_boston_neighborhood WHERE name NOT IN ('Harbor Islands','Central') ) AS boundary_boston_neighborhood

( SELECT *, CHAR_LENGTH(rt_number) as length FROM roads WHERE ( facilityty IN (1,2,3,4,5,6) AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE 'Public Aly%' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%Hov Ln%' AND map_label_txt NOT LIKE 'Sr-2' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%ramp%' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%connector%' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%extension%'AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%bypass%' AND admin_type > 0) ORDER BY ST_Length(geom) DESC) AS road_labels

( SELECT *, CHAR_LENGTH(rt_number) as length FROM roads WHERE ( facilityty IN (1,2,3,4,5,6) AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%Hov Ln%' AND map_label_txt NOT LIKE 'Sr-2' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%ramp%' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%connector%' AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%extension%'AND map_label_txt NOT ILIKE '%bypass%') ORDER BY ST_Length(geom) DESC) AS road_labels
( SELECT * FROM open_space WHERE site_name NOT LIKE 'undefined' ) AS open_space
( SELECT * FROM hydro_poly WHERE name NOT LIKE 'undefined') AS hydro_poly
